title: The.Witcher.3.Wild.Hunt.Blood.and.Wine-CODEX +Update.v1.22-CODEX
description:
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Blood and Wine (c) CD PROJEKT RED

Release Date :  05/2016              Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                    Genre      : RPG

Blood and Wine is the final expansion for The Witcher 3:  Wild Hunt
an award-winning role-playing game set in a  vast  fantasy  open
world.  Become  professional monster  slayer Geralt  of  Rivia  and
explore Toussaint, a remote land untouched by war, where  you  will
unravel  the  horrifying  secret  behind a  beast  terrorizing  the
kingdom. With all trails leading to dead ends, only a  witcher  can
solve the mystery and survive the evil lurking in the night
For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/378648/

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

Notes: this release is standalone and besides the new Blood and Wine
expansion it also includes the base game updated to the latest
version (1.21), as well as the previously released Hearts of Stone
expansion and other bonus DLCs

--------------------------------------------------------

The Witcher 3 - Wild Hunt Blood and Wine - Update v1.22

Release Date: 06/2016 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: RPG

For list of changes read included patchnotes.txt

Extract
Run setup.exe and install
Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

You need the following releases for this: The.Witcher.3.Wild.Hunt.Blood.and.Wine-CODEX

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

--------------------------------------------------------


*INSTALLATION*: 

1. Mount iso and install the game - The.Witcher.3.Wild.Hunt.Blood.and.Wine-CODEX
2. Install the update - The.Witcher.3.Wild.Hunt.Blood.and.Wine.Update.v1.22-CODEX
3. Copy the crack from the update to the main game dir.
4. Play !
